# llms.txt - Wasil Zafar Portfolio & Blog
# https://llmstxt.org/

> Wasil Zafar's personal portfolio and technical blog covering software engineering, cloud architecture, data science, philosophy, psychology, and more.

## About This Website

This is the personal portfolio and blog of Wasil Zafar, a Senior Developer & Cloud Architect with expertise in Adobe Experience Platform, AWS, and enterprise cloud solutions. The site features comprehensive educational content across technology, business, philosophy, and psychology.

## Site Structure

The website is organized into the following main sections:

### Homepage
- [Homepage](https://www.wasilzafar.com/): Main landing page with professional overview, skills, and certifications

### Categories
- [Technology](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/technology.html): Software engineering, cloud computing, AI/ML, system design, and data science articles
- [Business](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/business.html): Economics, entrepreneurship, consulting frameworks, and business strategy
- [Philosophy](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/philosophy.html): Logic, ethics, moral philosophy, critical thinking, and philosophical foundations
- [Psychology](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/psychology.html): Behavioral psychology, cognitive biases, decision-making, and research methods
- [Faith](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/faith.html): Spirituality and belief systems
- [Poetry](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/poetry.html): Creative writing and poetry
- [Gaming](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/categories/gaming.html): Game development tutorials and gaming content

## Featured Article Series

### Technology Series
- **System Design** (15 articles): Scalability, microservices, distributed systems, CAP theorem, databases, security
- **Cloud Computing** (11 articles): AWS, Azure, GCP fundamentals, containers, Kubernetes, serverless, DevOps
- **Data Structures & Algorithms** (12 articles): Arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, dynamic programming
- **NLP & AI** (16 articles): Transformers, BERT, GPT, word embeddings, neural networks, language models
- **Database Mastery** (15 articles): SQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, query optimization, data modeling
- **Computer Architecture** (9 articles): OS fundamentals, processes, threads, memory management, virtualization
- **Embedded Systems** (12 articles): Linux, RTOS, device drivers, Android HAL/BSP
- **API Development** (17 articles): REST, GraphQL, gRPC, authentication, OpenAPI, cloud API gateways
- **Python Data Science** (5 articles): NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, Jupyter notebooks
- **Artificial Intelligence** (6 articles): Neural networks, TensorFlow, PyTorch, computer vision
- **Protocols Master** (31 articles): OSI model, TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, TLS, VPN, IoT protocols
- **Game Development** (13 articles): Unity, Unreal, game design, 2D/3D development, multiplayer

### Business Series
- **Economics** (9 articles): Market fundamentals, behavioral economics, game theory, network effects
- **Entrepreneurship** (15 articles): Ideation, validation, fundraising, scaling, exit strategies
- **Consulting Frameworks** (6 articles): MECE, strategy frameworks, due diligence
- **Data-Driven Decision Making** (13 articles): KPIs, A/B testing, dashboards, predictive analytics

### Philosophy Series
- **Ethics & Moral Philosophy** (6 articles): Utilitarianism, deontology, virtue ethics, applied ethics
- **Logic & Critical Thinking** (6 articles): Deductive reasoning, inductive reasoning, fallacies

### Psychology Series
- **Behavioral Psychology** (11 articles): Decision-making, habits, motivation, nudge theory, neuroscience

## Contact

- [Contact Page](https://www.wasilzafar.com/pages/contact.html): Get in touch with Wasil Zafar
- Location: Houston, Texas, USA

## Technical Details

- **Platform**: Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript hosted on GitHub Pages
- **Domain**: www.wasilzafar.com
- **Author**: Wasil Zafar
- **Content Type**: Educational blog articles, technical tutorials, glossaries
- **Languages**: English
- **Last Updated**: February 2026

## Licensing & Usage

Content on this website is for educational purposes. Please respect copyright and attribute content appropriately when referencing.
